alert.note: Alert for Barbour (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:21PM CDT until August 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR PIKE...SOUTHERN BULLOCK AND WEST CENTRAL BARBOUR COUNTIES... At 220 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ansley to near Boot Hill, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Troy, Brundidge, Louisville, Banks, Pickett, Kent, Antioch, Linwood, Ansley, Troy Municipal Airport, Troy University, Boot Hill, Tanyard, Monticello, Orion, Perote, Josie, Sandfield, Mossy Grove and Mount Andrew. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
